After 5372 hours or roughly 223 days in-game I have come to the conclusion that this game is totally worth the time. Even though I finished high school with bad grades and lost many friends, my girlfriend, my job and thousands of dollars worth of skins, I have always told myself and everyone around me that this game is great. I have learnt countless ways of greeting people in different languages, which is nice, although I once got punched by a Russian guy in Copenhagen because i thought "suka" meant "hello". Another great thing about this game is that good feeling you get when you clutch a 1vs5 or hit a jump shot with the AWP. I'll never complain about this game.
